name: Jack & Viruz
description:
Jack & Viruz for the GMTK GameJam 2021!

NOTE: PLAY ON FULL SCREEN

CONTROLS: 
* Jack view: Use the mouse to drag and drop the icons
* Viruz view: Use the arrow to move and the space to jump
Use the buttons 'hack' and 'back' to switch between views

Art: Moose Kinsey - itch.io Profile

Game Developer: Victor Zamudio - Contact

Programmer: Arely Hernandez

Music & Sound Design by Juan Arango - Website
